ygData.subject: Wizards of Xegony!
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, I am a wizard on the great Server of Xegony. Seeing as we are one of the greatest classes out there we wizards should know each other. I propose a
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings, I am a wizard on the great Server of Xegony. Seeing as we are
one of the greatest classes out there we wizards should know each other.
I propose a gathering of names of all the wizards we can find! I see all
these posts about sharing languages here, and trading items there, but
most of the time they are on different servers and what not.

How many wizards on this list are from Xegony? Email me your character
names so I can put this list together and we will be able to share our
knowledge, experience, and adventures together. I would be most
interested in getting a group of like-minded, like-leveled wizards
together and seeing how we fare. Sharing languages and whipping mobs
into iobs, we can show those other classes that we are a force to be
reckoned with!

Croesus Illuminatus (Xegony)
Level 20 ( doesn't want to die )
*You stab em, we slab em*
